items.sentence: I didn't really need to wait for Tom, but I did.
I have to call Tom to get permission to do that.
I told Tom he shouldn't buy Mary's old computer.
I told Tom he shouldn't leave his door unlocked.
I'll tell Tom what he should say at the meeting.
I'm going to ask Tom if he can help us tomorrow.
I'm the one who helped Tom find a place to live.
I'm the one who told Tom not to do that anymore.
That boy over there with long black hair is Tom.
That's what Tom and I were told three hours ago.
